testSteps.description: (/blogs/) Verification for general page's elements #1: {elementKey=Open Source, pageURL=http://code.ticketmaster.com/, pageTitle=//h1[@id='logo']}

children.description: When check visibility and click {Open Source} element of Home page
Validate and click element: Open Source
Then check that new page opened from Home page has {http://code.ticketmaster.com/} and {//h1[@id='logo']}
Check if page is opened: http://code.ticketmaster.com/, //h1[@id='logo'], http://127.0.0.1:4000

userStory.narrative:
As a test engineer
I want to test Ticket Master Developer's site
So that I test Open Source Page of Ticket Master Developer's site
